p: Sodium deoxycholate, propylthiouracil and vitellus powder were procured from Sangon Guangzhou Surui Biotechnology., Ltd. (Guangzhou, China), and cholesterol was obtained from Shanghai Lanji Technology Development Co., Ltd. (Shanghai, China). Total cholesterol (TC), triglycerides (TGs), high-density lipoprotein cholesterol (HDL-C), low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C), superoxide dismutase (SOD), malondialdehyde (MDA) and reactive oxygen species (ROS) assay kits were purchased from the Nanjing Jiancheng Bioengineering Institute (Nanjing, China).
